document.bingtitle: Wannaburger - Edinburgh's Quality Fast Food Restaurant
document.webtitle: Wannaburger - Edinburgh's Quality Fast Food Restaurant
document.description: Wannaburger is a fast food restaurant based in Edinburgh's West End. It provides quality authentic American food made from fresh local ingredients.
document.body:

Home About The Story Going Green Vacancies Food Menu Blog Contact
Value
Fresh, homemade burgers from as little as£2.95 each
Read more
Quality
Locally sourced, fully traceable Scotch beef and free range chicken.
Read more
Service
Cooked to order and ready in double quick time!
Read more
Our Menus
At wannaburger we don’t just have burgers but also delicious milkshakes and also a range of fantastic desserts to round off your meal...they are worth the calories. Find Out More Socialise with us
To get all the lastest news and offers from wannaburger why not join us on one of our other social media sites or join our newsletter.
Follow us on Twitter Join us on Facebook
Loyalty Card
If you are a frequent wannaburger customer take advantage of our great loyalty card scheme by becoming a member. Find Out More Wannaburger 7/8 Queensferry Street Edinburgh EH2 4PA
, Tel : 0131 220 0036
